name: CATAN Universe
summary:
Set out on a journey into the CATAN universe, and compete in exciting duels against players from all over the world. The board game classic and "The Rivals of CATAN", with totally new graphics, bring an authentic gaming table feel to your screen.

Play the basic board game in multiplayer mode, as well as the introductory game for "The Rivals of CATAN, " free of charge. Master “Arrival on CATAN” for free, to unlock the Single-Player and Custom-Match modes for the basic “Arrival on CATAN” scenario permanently to play against the AI or your friends anytime.

For even more variety, activate the complete CATAN base game as well as the add-ons “Cities & Knights” and “Seafarers” as in-app purchases, defend yourself against barbarian invasions, conquer new frontiers, and compete against shrewd computer opponents.
